#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int T,N,K,i,j,wn,w[10],ret;
string sK,carry;

int main (int argc, char * const argv[]) {
//	freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin>>T;
	for(;T;T--){
		cin>>N>>K;
		carry="";sK="";
		while(K){
			sK+='0'+K%10;
			K/=10;
		}
		reverse(sK.begin(),sK.end());
		for(ret=0,i=1;i<=N;i++){
			j=i;wn=0;
			while(j){
				w[++wn]=j%10;
				j/=10;
			}
			for(j=wn;j;j--){
				carry+='0'+w[j];
				if(carry.length()>sK.length())carry.erase(0,1);
				ret+=carry==sK;
			}
		}
		cout<<ret<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
